title: #70: The Murders in Robin Hood Hills
description:
Three eight year old boys, Stevie Branch, Michael Moore and Christopher Byers went missing on May 5 1993. Tragically their bodies were found the next day in Robin Hood Hills. Our #RCP profilers start their criminal behavioural analysis of the victimology and the crime scene in the first episode in this new series, a case that spans 24 years.

#HisNameWasStevieBranch #HisNameWasMichaelMoore #HisNameWasChristopherByers
